subject: Useful idea
msgSnippet: How about this for a useful idea, if you see a question that you think is a waste of time, why not just ignore it rather than wasting more time by writing back
messageBody:
Useful idea

How about this for a useful idea,
if you see a question that you think is a waste of time, why not just ignore it rather than wasting more time by writing back responses that only really say "Are you so dumb to ask that question".  It seems that a high percentage of emails on this newsgroup are just that.  Come to think of it this email is just wortthless rubbish aswell.  I don't want to start another debate, I just would like that people would only use this list for talking about junit.

Nic
